title: Bluetooth volume issue with Pixel 4 XL. Volume is hardly there.
content: Have removed earbuds from Connected Devices and paired them again with pixel 4, have changed Bluetooth settings in both settings and developer options. Other headphones tend to have the same issue. It is not the specific earbuds as I have paired them with my Pixel 2 XL and they sound great.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
